org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api

Class AbstractRecordReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api.AbstractRecordReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReaderBase
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractSingleGateRecordReader, AbstractUnionRecordReader, CoRecordReader

    public abstract class AbstractRecordReader
extends Object
implements ReaderBase
    This is an abstract base class for a record reader, either dealing with mutable or immutable records, and dealing with reads from single gates (single end points) or multiple gates (union).
